text: JWT tokens are not invalidated after logout, making it easy to hijack sessions.
Updated README with install instructions.
If you send a POST with no content-type, the server crashes and dumps credentials.
Getting this error on Ubuntu 22.04 when running the script.
This function accepts unvalidated user input and directly executes it. Sounds like RCE to me.
Love the new dark mode, great job devs!
User passwords are stored in plain text in the DB. That can't be safe.
Added new feature to toggle themes dynamically.
I ran a fuzz test and found the login endpoint leaks memory and returns sensitive tokens.
The installer doesn't work properly on macOS Ventura.
No CSRF protection on delete-user endpoint. I was able to delete accounts by just clicking a link.
Improved UI responsiveness for mobile devices.
Why is the API returning the full server path in errors? That exposes the internal structure.
When will dark theme be available for the dashboard?
This allows SQL injection because the query isn’t parameterized.
The backup fails if the filename contains non-ASCII characters.
Auth bypass is possible by changing the cookie manually. Needs urgent patching.
Fixed typo in changelog.md
The server reveals stack traces on malformed requests, which could help an attacker.
Dropdown menu is misaligned on Safari.
XSS is possible via the `comments` field. Just inject a script tag and it's executed.
Added new tests for auth module.
The password reset form allows unlimited attempts, leading to brute force.
Thanks for the quick fix on the UI bug!
Sensitive config files are accessible via direct URL if you know the path.
Cannot resize the app window on high DPI displays.
I discovered that the token in the URL never expires, even after logout.
Added credits to the contributors page.
There’s a hidden debug endpoint active in production.
Still seeing alignment issues on Chrome.
You can bypass the admin panel login with a malformed JSON payload.
This doesn't work on Node.js 20, only 18.
Exposed internal IPs via HTTP headers.
The app freezes when importing large CSV files.
Someone could overwrite files on the server due to lack of path sanitization.
Can you make the font size bigger on mobile?
This API returns the full database schema if you pass `debug=true`.
Updated version number in package.json.
CVE-2021-XXXXX is still exploitable due to old dependency.
Please add a changelog for version 2.5.
Running a simple curl with malformed JSON gives internal SQL errors.
I get a white screen when loading the dashboard in Firefox.
The token gets logged in plain text in the console, which is a security concern.
Added French translations for UI.
Accessing `/admin/../config` gives full config dump.
Dark mode toggle isn't working after last patch.
This endpoint executes system commands based on query params. Needs validation.
Crash on startup when running inside Docker.
No auth check on export-data endpoint, exposes all user data.
Image upload fails on slow networks.
CSRF token is not validated, I could submit POST forms without logging in.
Changed button icon on settings page.
I think this code uses an outdated crypto library with known vulnerabilities.
Modal background doesn't cover entire screen.
If you pass `debug=1` in URL, it exposes environment variables.
The notification bell doesn't update in real time.
Exposed `.git` directory allows full repo download.
Scroll doesn't work correctly on iPhone SE.
